title: [H-04] DoS risk from pending prize locking mechanism
summary: A bug was found in the `SpinLottery` contract where users can temporarily prevent others from participating in the lottery. This is caused by a minimum guarantee mechanism that sets a conservative value for `pendingCount` if certain conditions are met. This can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS) situation when the total available prizes are insufficient. To fix this, the locking logic needs to be refined.
